body_html:
For now, THLongStorage_inferSizex are only used when input is some tensor size which will not include -1; so I decided not to add.

And in fact, inferSizex is trying to infer a size given serveral sizes; it should not support -1 because then there is no default size you can choose.
body_text:
For now, THLongStorage_inferSizex are only used when input is some tensor size which will not include -1; so I decided not to add.
And in fact, inferSizex is trying to infer a size given serveral sizes; it should not support -1 because then there is no default size you can choose.
body:
For now, THLongStorage_inferSizex are only used when input is some tensor size which will not include -1; so I decided not to add.

And in fact, inferSizex is trying to infer a size given serveral sizes; it should not support -1 because then there is no default size you can choose.
